module.name: Bulk Phone Restart
module.changelog: 15.2: Support chan_pjsip 15.1.1: Add Polycom CCX support 15.1: Improve scheduling, add day/month and recurring options 15.0.1: Fix "select all" button submitting form 15.0: Add scheduled restarts 13.0.7: Fixing FREEPBX-18131 Removing reboot by force option from yealink while sending sip notify to yealink phone. 13.0.6: Change repo to unsupported 13.0.5: FREEPBX-10708 13.0.4: FREEPBX-7382 block other modules from installing that conflict with sip notify 13.0.3: FREEPBX-9537 Bulk Phone Restart Error 13.0.2: Version bump Beta 13.0.1alpha1: Visuals 12.0.1: Redo module_hook calls to use static obj 2.11.0.1: Add license info 2.11.0.0: bump version 2.10.0.4: fix/improve sip notify 2.10.0.3: assotred bug fixes 2.10.0.2: #5537 2.10.0.1: minor fixes 2.10.0.0: new version changes 2.9.0.2: #4401 2.9.0.1: removed duplicate functions 2.9.0.0: #4627 2.8.0.1: #4426 2.8.0.0: #4309 2.7.0.0: localizations 2.6.0.1: #3912 2.6.0.0: Initial release
module.description: Restart registered phones through the FreePBX web interface, CLI, or on a schedule.
